definition: discharge, phlegm or sputum, from the lungs and out of the mouth by coughing
details:
verb
- discharge, phlegm or sputum, from the lungs and out of the mouth by coughing
= example: discharge, phlegm or sputum, from the lungs and out of the mouth by coughing
= synonyms: cough up, cough out, spit up, spit out
- clear out the chest and lungs
= example: clear out the chest and lungs
= synonyms: clear out, drive out
